name: Da-xn Island
description:
Da-xn Island is a brand new avatar social platform with many features and constant updates! We are also currently in beta!

We will also be adding the ability to create your own 2D games and share them with other people.

At the moment you can:

  • Customize your character
  • Browse some of our staff created games (You will be able to make your own soon!)
  • Make your own groups
  • Earn Da-xn Island Bux (Our virtual currency)
  • And much more!

We are also listening closely to community feedback so join our discord server and suggest some things that you think we could add!

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/C9yQrDJQAj
